capstone.ui

Class NamedWidget<W extends Widget>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Window
      • capstone.ui.Widget
        • capstone.ui.NamedWidget<W>
  • Type Parameters:
    W - The Widget to give a name.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Component
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InputWidget

    public class NamedWidget<W extends Widget>
extends Widget
    A Widget that is a slot with a Label and another Widget. The Label is supposed to give the Widget a "name", therefore this class is called NamedWidget. The Label is placed to the left of the Widget.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Component

      • NamedWidget

        public NamedWidget(java.lang.String name,
                   W widget)
        Constructs a new NamedWidget with the given name and Widget.
        Parameters:
        name - The name to give the Widget, i.e. what is displayed in the label to the left of the Widget.
        widget - The Widget to give a name and to put to the right of the Label.
